welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Nootdorp, Netherlands! Get ready to explore our beautiful city, known for its scenic views, rich culture, and warm hospitality. Enjoy your stay and discover all that Nootdorp has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Rotterdam Zestienhoven Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Rotterdam Zestienhoven Airport, mainly used for low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal is used for Schengen flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal is used for non-Schengen flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: This terminal is used for intercontinental flights.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.
